text: 7|85|mad‌yaṅkārilēkk avaruṭe sahēādaranāya śu'aibineyuṁ (ayaccu.) addēhaṁ paṟaññu: enṟe janaṅṅaḷē, niṅṅaḷ allāhuve ārādhikkuka. niṅṅaḷkk avanallāte yāteāru daivavumilla. niṅṅaḷkk niṅṅaḷuṭe rakṣitāviṅkal ninn vyaktamāya teḷiv vanniṭṭuṇṭ‌. atināl niṅṅaḷ aḷavuṁ tūkkavuṁ tikaccukeāṭukkaṇaṁ. janaṅṅaḷkku'avaruṭe sādhanaṅṅaḷil niṅṅaḷ kam'mivaruttarut‌. bhūmiyil nanmavaruttiyatin śēṣaṁ niṅṅaḷ aviṭe nāśamuṇṭākkarut‌. niṅṅaḷ viśvāsikaḷāṇeṅkil atāṇ niṅṅaḷkk uttamaṁ
